alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 17 at 6:59PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Pueblo, Avondale, Nepesta, Fowler, Rocky Ford, La Junta, Lamar...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River NEAR Avondale. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Minor Flood. Minor lowland flooding occurs near Avondale * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM MDT Saturday the stage was 6.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 6.3 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to 7.5 feet Wednesday morning. It will fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.8 feet on 04/24/1942. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 700 AM MDT.
